text: Blue Canyon is an unincorporated community in Whatcom County, in the U.S. state of Washington. ==History== A post office called Blue Canyon was established in 1892, and remained in operation until 1905. The community took its name from nearby Blue Canyon Mine. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Whatcom County, Washington Category:Unincorporated communities in Washington (state)
title: Blue Canyon, Washington
